leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-变异检测与基因分型生态
leaf_cluster.tool_form: CLI + 评测套件 + 数据集

unit.coverage_tools: 格式处理、统计、过滤、可视化

tools.name: shiny.gosling
tools.one_line_profile: R Shiny wrapper for Gosling.js genomics visualization grammar
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides a Shiny wrapper for Gosling.js, enabling the creation of scalable and interactive genomics data visualizations within R applications.

tools.name: epialleleR
tools.one_line_profile: Fast, epiallele-aware methylation caller and reporter
tools.detailed_description: An R/Bioconductor package for calling and reporting DNA methylation patterns (epialleles) from Next Generation Sequencing data, focusing on preserving haplotype information.

tools.name: SOAPnuke
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated Quality Control and Preprocessing tool for NGS data
tools.detailed_description: A C++ tool developed by BGI for rapid quality control and preprocessing (filtering, trimming) of FASTQ, BAM, and CRAM files generated by high-throughput sequencing.

tools.name: BamDeal
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive toolkit for BAM file manipulation
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit developed by BGI for various operations on BAM files, including statistics, filtering, and format conversion, facilitating downstream genomic analysis.

tools.name: tb_variant_filter
tools.one_line_profile: VCF filtering tool specialized for M. tuberculosis
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool designed to filter Variant Call Format (VCF) files specifically for Mycobacterium tuberculosis genomes, aiding in the identification of high-confidence variants.

tools.name: megadepth
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance BigWig and BAM coverage utilities
tools.detailed_description: A fast C++ tool for quantifying alignments and coverage from BAM and BigWig files, significantly faster than comparable tools like rtracklayer or mosdepth for specific tasks.

tools.name: chanjo
tools.one_line_profile: Coverage analysis tool for clinical sequencing
tools.detailed_description: A tool to analyze and extract coverage metrics from clinical sequencing data (BAM/CRAM), designed to integrate with clinical diagnostic workflows.

tools.name: ont2cram
tools.one_line_profile: Oxford Nanopore HDF/Fast5 to CRAM conversion tool
tools.detailed_description: A utility developed by EGA to convert Oxford Nanopore Technologies (ONT) raw data formats (HDF5/Fast5) into the compressed CRAM format for efficient storage and archival.

tools.name: vcf_annotation_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for VCF filtering and annotation
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based pipeline integrating GATK4, SnpSift, and VEP to filter, annotate, and prepare variant call data for downstream analysis tools like Scout.

tools.name: BamM
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenomics-focused BAM file manipulation
tools.detailed_description: A C-based tool suite for parsing and manipulating BAM files specifically for metagenomics applications, including parsing, filtering, and profiling.

tools.name: vcf-js
tools.one_line_profile: High performance VCF parser in JavaScript
tools.detailed_description: A pure JavaScript library for parsing Variant Call Format (VCF) files, developed by the GMOD project, suitable for web-based genomic applications.

tools.name: CoolBox
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter notebook based genomic data visualization toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for interactive genomic data visualization within Jupyter notebooks, supporting various file formats (BAM, BigWig, VCF) and customizable tracks.

tools.name: sv-channels
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based structural variant filtering
tools.detailed_description: A method that uses deep learning to filter structural variant calls by converting genomic data into image-like channels for classification.

tools.name: VerifyBamID
tools.one_line_profile: DNA contamination estimation from sequence reads
tools.detailed_description: A robust tool (VerifyBamID2) for estimating DNA contamination in sequence reads using an ancestry-agnostic method, essential for quality control in sequencing studies.

tools.name: Hadoop-BAM
tools.one_line_profile: Java library for manipulating bioinformatics formats in Hadoop
tools.detailed_description: A library that provides support for common bioinformatics file formats (BAM, VCF, FASTQ) within the Hadoop MapReduce framework, enabling scalable genomic data processing.

tools.name: dropSeqPipe
tools.one_line_profile: SingleCell RNASeq pre-processing snakemake workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for processing Drop-Seq data, handling steps from raw reads to expression matrices, including alignment and quality control.

tools.name: USeq
tools.one_line_profile: Suite of Java applications for NGS data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive collection of over 180 Java applications for analyzing NGS data, covering ChIP-Seq, RNA-Seq, variant annotation, filtering, and file manipulation.

tools.name: needlestack
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-sample somatic variant caller
tools.detailed_description: An R package for somatic variant calling that leverages multi-sample data to estimate error rates and detect variants, particularly useful for detecting low-frequency variants.

tools.name: vcfdo
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for processing and annotating VCF files
tools.detailed_description: A set of utilities for processing and annotating VCF files, with specific features tailored for Plasmodium species genomics.

tools.name: CNVizard
tools.one_line_profile: Browser-based tool for visualizing germline CNVs
tools.detailed_description: A web-based tool for visualizing and analyzing germline copy number variants (CNVs) in genomic data, facilitating interpretation of structural variations.

tools.name: R4RNA
tools.one_line_profile: R package for RNA-RNA interaction visualization
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed for the visualization of RNA-RNA interactions and genomic information derived from HiC or other interaction data.

tools.name: frequencyFilter
tools.one_line_profile: Allele frequency filtering for Mendelian variant discovery
tools.detailed_description: An R tool for filtering variants based on allele frequency, aiding in the discovery of causal variants in Mendelian disease studies.

tools.name: seave
tools.one_line_profile: Web platform for genetic variant filtering and annotation
tools.detailed_description: A web-based platform for filtering and annotating genetic variants, supporting pathogenicity prediction scores and disease database integration for clinical genomics.

tools.name: MutView
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight visualization tool for inspecting mutation coverage in BAM files
tools.detailed_description: MutView is a tool designed to visualize reads covering a specific mutation in a BAM file, generating an HTML output similar to a lightweight IGV snapshot.

tools.name: FluLINE
tools.one_line_profile: Automated pipeline for Influenza virus genome assembly and variant calling
tools.detailed_description: FluLINE is a comprehensive analysis pipeline for Influenza sequencing data, handling read filtering, species identification, consensus generation, and SNV calling.

tools.name: dv-trio
tools.one_line_profile: Trio variant calling pipeline using DeepVariant and GATK
tools.detailed_description: dv-trio provides a pipeline to call variants for a trio (father-mother-child) by integrating DeepVariant for gVCF generation and GATK for joint calling, followed by Mendelian error filtering.

tools.name: vcfppR
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance VCF/BCF parser for R
tools.detailed_description: vcfppR is an R package providing a fast C++ based parser for VCF and BCF files, enabling efficient manipulation of variant data within the R environment.

tools.name: All2
tools.one_line_profile: Variant filtering tool for all-to-all clone or single-cell comparisons
tools.detailed_description: All2 is a tool designed for filtering variants derived from all-to-all comparisons of multiple clones or single cells, useful in somatic mosaicism studies.

tools.name: Determine_sex_from_bam
tools.one_line_profile: Utility to infer sample sex from BAM alignment data
tools.detailed_description: A Python utility that analyzes alignment data in BAM files to infer the biological sex of the sample based on chromosomal coverage.

tools.name: SciVis
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for genomic data
tools.detailed_description: SciVis is a Python-based tool for visualizing genomic data, likely providing plotting capabilities for sequencing or variant datasets.

tools.name: Axial
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualizations for high-dimensional genomics data
tools.detailed_description: Axial provides interactive visualization capabilities specifically tailored for high-dimensional genomics datasets, facilitating data exploration.

tools.name: alignoth
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for creating alignment plots from BAM files
tools.detailed_description: alignoth is a Rust-based tool designed to generate visual plots of sequence alignments directly from BAM files, aiding in alignment inspection.

tools.name: pysamstats
tools.one_line_profile: Fast statistics extraction from genome alignments
tools.detailed_description: pysamstats is a fast Python and command-line utility for calculating statistics (coverage, mismatch rates, etc.) against genome positions based on SAM/BAM alignments.

tools.name: iGVPT2
tools.one_line_profile: Program for computing anharmonic corrections to vibration frequencies
tools.detailed_description: iGVPT2 computes anharmonic corrections to vibration frequencies based on force field expansion of the potential energy surface, serving computational chemistry/physics tasks.

tools.name: DNA_Rchitect
tools.one_line_profile: Shiny App for visualizing genomic data
tools.detailed_description: DNA_Rchitect is an R Shiny application designed for the visualization of genomic data, providing an interactive interface for data analysis.

tools.name: nxf-fastqc
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for FastQC and MultiQC
tools.detailed_description: A simple Nextflow pipeline that integrates fastp and MultiQC to perform quality control on sequencing data.

tools.name: seqkit (annalam)
tools.one_line_profile: Rust-based toolkit for manipulating FASTA and SAM files
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit written in Rust for manipulating FASTA and SAM files. (Note: Distinct from the widely used Go-based seqkit by shenwei356).

tools.name: genomics-data-index
tools.one_line_profile: Genome indexing system for rapid querying and visualization
tools.detailed_description: Indexes genomes using SNVs, MLST, or kmers to enable rapid querying, clustering, and visualization of large genomic datasets.

tools.name: picovcf
tools.one_line_profile: Single-header C++ library for fast VCF parsing
tools.detailed_description: picovcf is a lightweight, single-header C++ library designed for fast and low-memory parsing of VCF (Variant Call Format) files.

tools.name: msamtools
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenomics extensions for samtools
tools.detailed_description: msamtools provides extended functionalities to samtools specifically tailored for metagenomics analysis, such as profiling and filtering.

tools.name: bisulfite-seq-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Suite for bisulfite sequencing data analysis and QC
tools.detailed_description: A suite of tools for alignment and quality control analysis of bisulfite sequencing data, supporting WGBS, RRBS, and HSBS protocols.

tools.name: hichipper
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing and QC pipeline for HiChIP data
tools.detailed_description: hichipper is a pipeline designed for the preprocessing and quality control of HiChIP data, facilitating chromatin conformation analysis.

tools.name: bacQC
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for bacterial isolate sequence quality assessment
tools.detailed_description: bacQC is a bioinformatics pipeline for assessing the quality of bacterial isolate sequence data, automating QC steps for microbiology workflows.

tools.name: basespace-igv
tools.one_line_profile: BaseSpace integration for IGV
tools.detailed_description: A version or integration of the Integrative Genomics Viewer (IGV) designed to work with Illumina BaseSpace data.

tools.name: CpG_Me
tools.one_line_profile: WGBS pipeline for alignment and methylation QC
tools.detailed_description: CpG_Me is a Whole Genome Bisulfite Sequencing (WGBS) pipeline that processes raw reads to CpG count matrices, handling alignment and QC.

tools.name: pmultiqc
tools.one_line_profile: Library for generating QC reports extending MultiQC
tools.detailed_description: pmultiqc is a library designed to generate quality control reports, built upon the MultiQC framework, likely for proteomics or specific bio-data extensions.

tools.name: biocpp-io
tools.one_line_profile: C++ I/O library for bioinformatics formats
tools.detailed_description: BioC++ Input/Output library provides modern C++ interfaces for reading and writing standard bioinformatics file formats.

tools.name: sambamba
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance tools for SAM/BAM data manipulation
tools.detailed_description: Sambamba provides a suite of highly parallelized tools for working with SAM and BAM files, offering faster alternatives to standard samtools commands for sorting, indexing, and viewing.

tools.name: bionode-sam
tools.one_line_profile: Node.js wrapper for samtools
tools.detailed_description: A Node.js wrapper for samtools, allowing integration of SAM/BAM processing capabilities into JavaScript/Node.js applications.

tools.name: bionode-vcf
tools.one_line_profile: JavaScript VCF parser
tools.detailed_description: A VCF (Variant Call Format) parser implementation in JavaScript, part of the bionode ecosystem.

tools.name: biowasm
tools.one_line_profile: WebAssembly modules for genomics tools
tools.detailed_description: biowasm provides WebAssembly ports of popular genomics tools (like samtools, seqtk), enabling them to run directly in web browsers.

tools.name: biowdl-RNA-seq
tools.one_line_profile: BioWDL pipeline for RNA-seq data processing
tools.detailed_description: A WDL-based pipeline for processing RNA-seq data, from FASTQ to expression measures and VCFs, designed for reproducibility.

tools.name: favr
tools.one_line_profile: Filtering and Annotation of Variants that are Rare
tools.detailed_description: favr is a tool designed for the filtering and annotation of rare variants, aiding in the identification of potential disease-causing mutations.

tools.name: varlap
tools.one_line_profile: Variant quality control and context analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: varlap is a tool for quality control of DNA variants, reporting statistics related to local alignment context in BAM files to identify artifacts.

tools.name: GBSapp
tools.one_line_profile: Automated pipeline for GBS variant calling
tools.detailed_description: GBSapp is an automated pipeline for variant and haplotype calling and filtering, specifically tailored for Genotyping-by-Sequencing (GBS) data.

tools.name: escheR
tools.one_line_profile: R package for visualizing spatial genomics colocalization
tools.detailed_description: escheR is an R package designed to visualize colocalization for single-cell and spatially-resolved genomics data.

tools.name: cyvcf2
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Python VCF/BCF parser using Cython and htslib
tools.detailed_description: cyvcf2 is a high-performance Python library for VCF and BCF processing, leveraging Cython and htslib for speed.

tools.name: echtvar
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid variant annotation and filtering tool
tools.detailed_description: echtvar is a tool for extremely fast variant annotation and filtering, using a compact encoding for efficient processing.

tools.name: jigv
tools.one_line_profile: IGV.js standalone page generator
tools.detailed_description: jigv is a tool that automatically generates a standalone HTML page configured with igv.js to view BAM, CRAM, VCF, and BED files.

tools.name: mosdepth
tools.one_line_profile: Fast BAM/CRAM depth calculation tool
tools.detailed_description: mosdepth is a highly efficient tool for calculating sequencing depth from BAM and CRAM files, suitable for WGS, exome, or targeted sequencing.

tools.name: slivar
tools.one_line_profile: Expression-based variant filtering and annotation
tools.detailed_description: slivar enables filtering and annotation of genetic variants in VCF/BCF files using flexible expressions, supporting trio and population studies.

tools.name: VariantBam
tools.one_line_profile: Region-specific filtering and profiling of BAM files
tools.detailed_description: VariantBam is a tool for filtering and profiling next-generation sequencing data (BAM/CRAM) using region-specific rules to reduce file size or extract specific data.

tools.name: Picard
tools.one_line_profile: Standard toolset for manipulating HTS data (SAM/BAM/VCF)
tools.detailed_description: Picard is a set of Java-based command-line tools for manipulating high-throughput sequencing data formats such as SAM, BAM, CRAM, and VCF, widely used for QC and data processing.

tools.name: tgg-viewer
tools.one_line_profile: Web app for visualizing splice junctions and sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: tgg-viewer is a web application that uses IGV.js to visualize splice junctions, expression data, and other sequencing features genome-wide.

tools.name: vawk
tools.one_line_profile: Awk-like VCF parser
tools.detailed_description: vawk is a command-line utility that provides an awk-like syntax specifically designed for parsing and filtering VCF files.

tools.name: weeSAM
tools.one_line_profile: Coverage statistics calculator for SAM/BAM files
tools.detailed_description: weeSAM is a script designed to parse SAM/BAM files and calculate coverage statistics, providing a lightweight alternative for basic QC metrics.

tools.name: igvScreenshot
tools.one_line_profile: Automation utility for creating static genomic region screenshots using IGV
tools.detailed_description: A shell script wrapper that automates the process of generating static screenshots of specific genomic regions using the Integrative Genomics Viewer (IGV), facilitating batch visualization for genomics research.

tools.name: variant-filter
tools.one_line_profile: False-positive filter for variants from massively parallel sequencing
tools.detailed_description: A Perl-based utility designed to filter false-positive variant calls from next-generation sequencing data, improving the accuracy of variant detection pipelines.

tools.name: VariantVisualization.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia package for visualization of genomic variation data
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package that powers VIVA (Viral Variant Visualizer), providing capabilities for visualizing genomic variation data, specifically designed for analyzing viral genomes and other variant datasets.

tools.name: chromoMap
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive genomic visualization of biological data in R
tools.detailed_description: An R package for constructing interactive chromosome visualizations, allowing users to map genomic features and data onto chromosomal ideograms for exploratory data analysis.

tools.name: hubward
tools.one_line_profile: Manager for UCSC Genome Browser visualization hubs
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to manage the creation and organization of UCSC Genome Browser track hubs, facilitating the visualization of large and complex genomics datasets.

tools.name: genozip
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance compressor for genomic file formats
tools.detailed_description: A modern compression tool optimized for genomic data formats including FASTQ, BAM, CRAM, and VCF, offering significantly better compression ratios and speed compared to standard gzip.

tools.name: filterx
tools.one_line_profile: Command-line tool for filtering tabular genomic data
tools.detailed_description: A Rust-based command-line utility for processing and filtering various tabular genomic file formats such as FASTA, FASTQ, GTF, GFF, VCF, SAM, and BED, providing a flexible interface for data manipulation.

tools.name: vcfio
tools.one_line_profile: Python parser and I/O library for VCF files
tools.detailed_description: A Python library developed by Emedgene for parsing and performing Input/Output operations on Variant Call Format (VCF) files, facilitating the integration of VCF data into Python-based analysis pipelines.

tools.name: igv-jupyterlab
tools.one_line_profile: Integrative Genomics Viewer extension for JupyterLab
tools.detailed_description: A JupyterLab extension that embeds the Integrative Genomics Viewer (IGV.js), allowing researchers to visualize genomic datasets directly within their Jupyter notebook environment.

tools.name: PLUTON
tools.one_line_profile: Automated pipeline for fetal gender and chromosomal aneuploidy prediction
tools.detailed_description: An open-source shell-based pipeline integrating tools like MultiQC, FastQC, SAMtools, and WisecondorX to preprocess aligned reads and predict fetal gender and chromosomal aneuploidies from sequencing data.

tools.name: genome_tracks
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for visualizing genome browser tracks
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow designed to automate the generation and visualization of genome browser tracks from aligned BAM files (RNA-seq, ATAC-seq, etc.), utilizing pyGenomeTracks and IGV-reports.

tools.name: scrnaseq_processing_seurat
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for scRNA-seq processing with Seurat
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for processing and visualizing single-cell and single-nucleus RNA-seq data, leveraging the Seurat R package for downstream analysis of 10X Genomics or MTX format data.

tools.name: epiviz-chart
tools.one_line_profile: Component library for genomic data visualization
tools.detailed_description: A web component library providing interactive charting capabilities for genomic data, designed to be integrated into web applications for visualizing epigenomic and genomic datasets.

tools.name: epiviz.gl
tools.one_line_profile: WebGL-based genomic data visualization library
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance genomic data visualization library using WebGL and WebWorkers to provide fluid and responsive user experiences for large-scale genomic datasets.

tools.name: pandasVCF
tools.one_line_profile: VCF parser using Python pandas
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that parses Variant Call Format (VCF) files into pandas DataFrames, enabling easy manipulation and analysis of genomic variant data using the pandas ecosystem.

tools.name: snphub
tools.one_line_profile: Server framework for genomic variation analysis and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A Shiny-based server framework designed for retrieving, analyzing, and visualizing large-scale genomic variation data, facilitating collaborative research and data sharing within labs.

tools.name: netview
tools.one_line_profile: Genomic population network visualization tool
tools.detailed_description: An R package for generating and visualizing mutual nearest neighbor graphs to analyze population structure and networks from genomic data.

tools.name: VCF-Simplify
tools.one_line_profile: Python parser to simplify VCF files
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based utility to parse and simplify Variant Call Format (VCF) files, making them easier to handle and analyze by reducing complexity or extracting key information.

tools.name: vcf-reformatter
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance VCF parser and reformatter
tools.detailed_description: A Rust-based tool designed for high-performance parsing and reformatting of VCF files, with specific support for VEP annotations and conversion to TSV format for downstream analysis.

tools.name: auto_process_ngs
tools.one_line_profile: Automated processing utilities for Illumina NGS data
tools.detailed_description: A suite of scripts and utilities used for the automatic processing and management of Illumina Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) data, developed for the Bioinformatics Core Facility at the University of Manchester.

tools.name: QuasR
tools.one_line_profile: R package for quantification and analysis of short reads
tools.detailed_description: An R/Bioconductor package providing a comprehensive framework for the quantification and analysis of short sequencing reads, covering alignment, quality control, and quantification of genomic regions.

tools.name: VarGenius
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for variant discovery and annotation
tools.detailed_description: A software pipeline for variant discovery and annotation that manages data organization and job submission to PBS clusters, integrating tools like Picard, Samtools, BWA, GATK, and Annovar, and storing results in a PostgreSQL database.

tools.name: igv-jupyter
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter extension for IGV.js integration
tools.detailed_description: An extension for Jupyter Notebooks that integrates igv.js, enabling interactive genomic visualization directly within the notebook environment for data analysis workflows.

tools.name: mpileup2readcounts
tools.one_line_profile: Utility to extract per-nucleotide read counts from samtools mpileup output
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight C++ utility designed to parse the output of 'samtools mpileup' and generate a table of read counts per nucleotide for each genomic position. This tool facilitates downstream statistical analysis of sequencing depth and allele frequencies.

tools.name: GARFIELD-NGS
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based tool for filtering genomic variants in NGS data
tools.detailed_description: GARFIELD-NGS (Genomic vARiants FIltering by dEep Learning moDels in NGS) utilizes deep learning models to distinguish true variants from false positives in Next-Generation Sequencing data, improving the accuracy of variant calling pipelines.

tools.name: Genome Spy
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated visualization grammar and toolkit for genomic data
tools.detailed_description: A visualization toolkit based on the grammar of graphics, designed specifically for genomic data. It leverages GPU acceleration to render interactive visualizations of large-scale genomic datasets directly in the browser.

tools.name: joinx
tools.one_line_profile: Command-line tool for processing and manipulating BED and VCF files
tools.detailed_description: A C++ toolset for performing operations on genomic interval files (BED) and variant files (VCF), including intersection, merging, and format manipulation, useful for genomic data processing pipelines.

tools.name: igv_remote
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for controlling IGV desktop via port commands
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that enables programmatic control of the Integrative Genomics Viewer (IGV) desktop application. It allows users to send batch commands to IGV over a port, facilitating automated visualization workflows.

tools.name: Gitools
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for analysis and interactive visualization of multidimensional genomic data
tools.detailed_description: An interactive framework for the analysis and visualization of genomic data using browsable heatmaps. It supports data integration from sources like IntOGen and Biomart, enabling researchers to explore complex genomic datasets.

tools.name: igvR
tools.one_line_profile: R Bioconductor package for interactive IGV.js connections
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides an interactive connection to the Integrative Genomics Viewer (igv.js) within a web browser. It allows R users to visualize genomic data tracks directly from their analysis environment.

tools.name: igvShiny
tools.one_line_profile: R Shiny widget for embedding IGV.js genomic visualizations
tools.detailed_description: An HTML widget that wraps igv.js for use in RStudio and Shiny applications, enabling the development of interactive web applications with embedded genomic visualizations.

tools.name: biobambam2
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for early-stage alignment file processing (BAM/CRAM)
tools.detailed_description: A collection of efficient tools for processing BAM and CRAM files, including utilities for sorting, marking duplicates (bamsormadup), and file format conversion. It is optimized for performance in high-throughput sequencing pipelines.

tools.name: bamstats
tools.one_line_profile: Command-line tool for computing mapping statistics from BAM files
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Go-based tool designed to calculate comprehensive mapping statistics from BAM files, providing metrics essential for quality control of alignment data.

tools.name: igv-httpfs
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptor enabling IGV to access HDFS data via HttpFS
tools.detailed_description: A middleware adaptor that allows the Integrative Genomics Viewer (IGV) to read genomic data stored in Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS) using the HttpFS protocol, facilitating analysis of large-scale distributed datasets.

tools.name: vcf.js
tools.one_line_profile: JavaScript library for parsing VCF files and modeling variant records
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library that provides a parser and object model for Variant Call Format (VCF) files, enabling web-based applications to read and manipulate genomic variant data.

tools.name: BAQCOM
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for RNA-Seq quality control, mapping, and read counting
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline script for RNA-Seq data analysis that automates quality control, read mapping, and quantification steps, streamlining the processing of transcriptomic data.

tools.name: SparK
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for generating publication-quality NGS track plots
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based visualization tool designed to create high-quality, customizable track plots for Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) data, suitable for scientific publications.

tools.name: BamDeal
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive toolkit for BAM file manipulation and statistics
tools.detailed_description: A C++ toolkit offering a suite of functions for manipulating BAM files, including filtering, format conversion, and statistical analysis, designed to assist in genomic data processing.

tools.name: VCF.Filter
tools.one_line_profile: Java application for graphical filtering of VCF files
tools.detailed_description: A Java-based desktop application that allows users to graphically filter and prioritize genomic sequence variants in VCF files based on custom annotations and criteria.

tools.name: samtools-ruby
tools.one_line_profile: Ruby FFI bindings for Samtools
tools.detailed_description: A Ruby library that provides FFI (Foreign Function Interface) bindings to Samtools, enabling Ruby developers to interact with BAM/SAM files using the efficient C-based Samtools library.

tools.name: IGV
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance desktop visualization tool for interactive genomics
tools.detailed_description: The Integrative Genomics Viewer (IGV) is a high-performance visualization tool for interactive exploration of large, integrated genomic datasets. It supports a wide variety of data types, including array-based and next-generation sequencing data, and genomic annotations.

tools.name: IGV for iPad
tools.one_line_profile: Mobile version of the Integrative Genomics Viewer for iPad
tools.detailed_description: An iOS application bringing the core functionality of the Integrative Genomics Viewer to the iPad, allowing researchers to visualize and explore genomic data on a mobile tablet interface.

tools.name: igv-notebook
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter notebook extension for embedding IGV.js
tools.detailed_description: A Python module that enables the embedding of the igv.js genomic visualization component directly into IPython/Jupyter notebooks, facilitating interactive data exploration within data science workflows.

tools.name: igv-reports
tools.one_line_profile: Generator for self-contained HTML genomic reports with embedded IGV
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that generates self-contained HTML reports containing IGV visualizations. These reports embed the necessary data subsets, allowing for offline viewing and sharing of genomic insights without dependencies on original large data files.

tools.name: IGV Web App
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based application for the Integrative Genomics Viewer
tools.detailed_description: The web application version of IGV, providing a browser-based interface for genomic data visualization. It allows users to load and view genomic tracks and files without installing desktop software.

tools.name: igv.js
tools.one_line_profile: Embeddable JavaScript component for genomic visualization
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library that allows developers to embed the Integrative Genomics Viewer functionality into web pages and applications. It supports a wide range of genomic file formats and provides a rich API for customization.

tools.name: Spacewalk
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive 3D visualization tool for chromatin tracing data
tools.detailed_description: An application designed for the visualization and interaction with super-resolution chromatin tracing data in 3D. It integrates 1D genomic data (via igv.js) and 2D contact maps (via juicebox.js) with 3D structural data for comprehensive chromatin analysis.

tools.name: vcf2prot
tools.one_line_profile: GPU-accelerated tool for generating personalized proteomes from VCF
tools.detailed_description: A Rust-based tool that leverages GPU acceleration to rapidly generate personalized proteome sequences by incorporating variants from a VCF file into a reference proteome, useful for proteogenomics studies.

tools.name: vcf-rs
tools.one_line_profile: Rust library for parsing VCF files
tools.detailed_description: A Rust implementation of a VCF parser, providing efficient and type-safe methods for reading and processing Variant Call Format files in Rust applications.

tools.name: vcfimp
tools.one_line_profile: Strict VCF parser library for Scala
tools.detailed_description: A Scala library for parsing Variant Call Format (VCF) files with strict adherence to the format specification, ensuring data integrity during processing.

tools.name: iobio.viz
tools.one_line_profile: JavaScript library for visualizing streaming genomic data
tools.detailed_description: A visualization library tailored for streaming genomic data, providing components for charting and displaying real-time analysis results in web applications.

tools.name: LanGen_pipeline_version2
tools.one_line_profile: R scripts pipeline for Landscape Genomics Analyses
tools.detailed_description: A collection of R scripts forming a pipeline for landscape genomics analysis, facilitating the study of genetic variation in the context of environmental landscapes.

tools.name: clinical-filter
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for filtering trio-based genetic variants for clinical review
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to filter genetic variants from VCF files in a clinical context, specifically for trio analysis (parents and child), to identify potential disease-causing mutations for review.

tools.name: alignstats
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for computing comprehensive alignment and coverage statistics
tools.detailed_description: A C-based utility that generates detailed statistics on alignment quality, whole-genome coverage, and capture coverage from BAM/CRAM files, aiding in the quality assessment of sequencing experiments.

tools.name: needLR
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variant filtering and prioritization for long-read data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for filtering and prioritizing structural variants detected in long-read sequencing data, helping to reduce false positives and identify high-confidence variants.

tools.name: TaxTriage
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow workflow for microbial identification in metagenomic data
tools.detailed_description: A flexible Nextflow workflow designed to identify and classify microbial organisms from short- or long-read metagenomic NGS data, supporting various mNGS use cases.

tools.name: smsk_popoolation
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for Popoolation and Popoolation2
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow that automates the execution of Popoolation and Popoolation2 tools, streamlining population genetics analysis from pooled sequencing data.

tools.name: ALPACA
tools.one_line_profile: Algebraic variant caller for NGS data with sample-based filtering
tools.detailed_description: A genomic variant caller for single nucleotide variants and small indels that employs an algebraic approach to incorporate sample-based filtering directly into the calling process, allowing for intuitive False Discovery Rate (FDR) control.

tools.name: HilbertCurve
tools.one_line_profile: R package for visualizing genomic data using Hilbert curves
tools.detailed_description: A tool that provides an implementation of Hilbert curves for visualizing high-dimensional genomic data in a 2D space, allowing for the effective representation of long-range genomic interactions and other spatial features.

tools.name: ipyigv
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter widget for the igv.js genome browser
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper that enables the embedding of the Integrative Genomics Viewer (igv.js) directly into Jupyter notebooks, facilitating interactive genomic data visualization and analysis within Python workflows.

tools.name: MetaProFi
tools.one_line_profile: Bloom filter-based tool for sequence data querying
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for storing and querying sequence data using Bloom filters to accurately identify functionally relevant genetic variants, developed by the Kalinina Lab.

tools.name: igv_utils
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for controlling IGV and igv.js
tools.detailed_description: A collection of utilities for working with the Integrative Genomics Viewer (IGV), including functionality for opening files remotely in desktop IGV or web viewers and creating screenshots.

tools.name: pyfaidx
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient Pythonic random access to FASTA subsequences
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides efficient, pythonic random access to subsequences within FASTA files, handling indexing and memory management automatically.

tools.name: vcf-go
tools.one_line_profile: Variant Call Format (VCF) parser library for Go
tools.detailed_description: A library written in Go for parsing Variant Call Format (VCF) files, enabling the development of high-performance bioinformatics tools in the Go programming language.

tools.name: Picard-ICA
tools.one_line_profile: Preconditioned ICA for Real Data
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Preconditioned Independent Component Analysis (ICA) algorithm, designed for efficient signal processing and source separation in scientific data (e.g., EEG/MEG).

tools.name: GeneticsMakie.jl
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance genetics data visualization in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package leveraging Makie.jl for high-performance, interactive visualization of genetics and genomics data, including GWAS results and linkage disequilibrium plots.

tools.name: vcf_parser
tools.one_line_profile: Simple VCF parser based on PyVCF
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Python library for parsing Variant Call Format (VCF) files, designed as a simpler alternative or wrapper around PyVCF for extracting variant information.

tools.name: gTrack
tools.one_line_profile: R package for multi-track genomic data visualization
tools.detailed_description: An R package for visualizing complex 1D and 2D genomic data within the GenomicRanges framework, supporting multi-track layouts for structural variants and copy number profiles.

tools.name: Iliad
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Snakemake workflows for genomic data processing
tools.detailed_description: A suite of automated Snakemake workflows designed to process genomic data for various downstream applications, facilitating reproducible analysis pipelines.

tools.name: nf-core/hgtseq
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to investigate horizontal gene transfer from NGS data
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline developed under nf-core standards for detecting and investigating horizontal gene transfer events using Next Generation Sequencing (NGS) data.

tools.name: nf-core/seqinspector
tools.one_line_profile: Dedicated QC pipeline for sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for comprehensive quality control of sequencing data, capable of running multiple QC tools and generating aggregated MultiQC reports, suitable for core facilities.

tools.name: NGLess
tools.one_line_profile: Domain-specific language for NGS data processing
tools.detailed_description: NGLess is a domain-specific language and framework designed to simplify Next Generation Sequencing (NGS) data processing, ensuring reproducibility and ease of use for common bioinformatics tasks.

tools.name: rna-seq-diff-exprn
tools.one_line_profile: RNA-Seq differential expression analysis pipeline integrating multiple standard tools
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for RNA-Sequencing data analysis that performs genome coverage calculation, differential expression analysis, structural variant detection, and differential exon usage analysis using tools like DESeq, NOISeq, and DEXSeq.

tools.name: JSorolla
tools.one_line_profile: JavaScript library for biological and genomic data visualization
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library developed by OpenCB for visualizing biological and genomic data, providing components for web-based genomic tools.

tools.name: hic_qc
tools.one_line_profile: Simple quality control script for Hi-C data
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight tool for performing quality control on Hi-C sequencing data, developed by Phase Genomics.

tools.name: faster-ica
tools.one_line_profile: Library for maximum likelihood Independent Component Analysis (ICA) algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing several maximum likelihood ICA algorithms, including the Picard algorithm, used for signal processing and source separation in scientific data.

tools.name: radseq
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for parsing and analyzing RAD-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python scripts designed for the processing, parsing, and analysis of Restriction site Associated DNA sequencing (RAD-seq) data.

tools.name: pysam
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for reading and manipulating genomics data (SAM/BAM/VCF)
tools.detailed_description: A widely used Python library that wraps HTSlib, enabling efficient reading, manipulating, and writing of genomic data formats including SAM, BAM, CRAM, VCF, and BCF.

tools.name: VisualQC
tools.one_line_profile: Assistive tool for quality control of neuroimaging data
tools.detailed_description: A software tool designed to ease the quality control workflow of neuroimaging data, providing visualization and assessment capabilities.

tools.name: gd3
tools.one_line_profile: JavaScript library for visualizing genomics data with D3
tools.detailed_description: A library for creating interactive genomic data visualizations using D3.js, developed by the Raphael research group.

tools.name: bioruby-samtools
tools.one_line_profile: Ruby bindings for samtools via FFI
tools.detailed_description: A BioRuby plugin that provides bindings to the samtools library, allowing manipulation of SAM/BAM files within Ruby applications.

tools.name: PyPore
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for quality control and processing of nanopore sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit designed for fast and accurate quality control, format conversion, and alignment of nanopore sequencing data.

tools.name: BCFtools
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for variant calling and manipulating VCF/BCF files
tools.detailed_description: A set of utilities that manipulate variant calls in the Variant Call Format (VCF) and its binary counterpart (BCF). It is a core tool for variant calling, filtering, and analysis.

tools.name: samtools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for manipulating next-generation sequencing data (SAM/BAM/CRAM)
tools.detailed_description: A suite of programs for interacting with high-throughput sequencing data. It provides functionality for reading, writing, editing, indexing, and viewing data in SAM, BAM, and CRAM formats.

tools.name: Estimation-algorithms
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB functions for estimation algorithms (EKF, UKF, Particle Filter)
tools.detailed_description: A collection of MATLAB implementations for various estimation algorithms including Extended Kalman Filter, Unscented Kalman Filter, and Particle Filter, used in scientific modeling and control.

tools.name: SeqAn3
tools.one_line_profile: Modern C++ library for efficient sequence analysis
tools.detailed_description: The third version of the SeqAn library, providing efficient, generic, and reusable C++ algorithms and data structures for the analysis of biological sequences.

tools.name: vcztools
tools.one_line_profile: Partial reimplementation of bcftools for VCF Zarr
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed by the sgkit project to manipulate VCF data stored in Zarr format, aiming to provide bcftools-like functionality for cloud-native genomics.

tools.name: chip-seq_preprocess
tools.one_line_profile: Preprocessing pipeline for ChIP-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for processing ChIP-seq data, covering alignment, quality control, and visualization steps, developed by the Shen Lab at Mount Sinai.

tools.name: ngsplot
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for NGS data mining
tools.detailed_description: A tool for quick mining and visualization of Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) data by integrating genomic databases, allowing for the generation of enrichment plots and heatmaps.

tools.name: SeqKit
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-platform toolkit for FASTA/Q file manipulation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive and ultrafast toolkit for processing FASTA and FASTQ files, providing functions for statistics, formatting, filtering, and conversion.

tools.name: picardmetrics
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper to run Picard metrics and collate results
tools.detailed_description: A shell-based utility that runs various Picard tools on BAM files to generate QC metrics and collates them into a single summary file.

tools.name: QC3
tools.one_line_profile: Quality control tool for DNA sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A quality control tool designed for DNA sequencing data, handling raw data, alignment, and variant calling stages.

tools.name: IGV-snapshot-automator
tools.one_line_profile: Automation tool for generating genomic data snapshots using IGV
tools.detailed_description: A Python script that automates the creation of batch scripts for the Integrative Genomics Viewer (IGV) to take snapshots of specific genomic regions, facilitating visual inspection of variants.

tools.name: Alfred
tools.one_line_profile: BAM statistics, feature counting, and annotation tool
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance C++ tool for quality control, feature counting, and annotation of BAM alignment files, supporting various sequencing protocols.

tools.name: bio-vcf
tools.one_line_profile: DSL-based VCF parser and filter
tools.detailed_description: A smart VCF parser that provides a Domain Specific Language (DSL) for filtering, parsing, and rewriting VCF files, implemented in Ruby.

tools.name: vcflib
tools.one_line_profile: C++ library and command-line tools for VCF manipulation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive C++ library and suite of command-line tools for parsing, manipulating, and filtering VCF files, serving as a foundational toolkit for variant analysis.

tools.name: VCFtools
tools.one_line_profile: Program package for working with VCF files
tools.detailed_description: A classic suite of tools written in Perl and C++ for working with VCF files, providing validation, merging, comparing, and calculating statistics for genomic variants.

tools.name: VariantBam
tools.one_line_profile: Region-specific filtering and profiling of sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for filtering and profiling next-generation sequencing data (BAM/CRAM) using region-specific rules to extract or remove reads based on complex criteria.

tools.name: cramino
tools.one_line_profile: Fast quality evaluation tool for BAM/CRAM files
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance Rust-based tool for generating quality metrics and statistics for BAM and CRAM files, specifically optimized for long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: biobear
tools.one_line_profile: Bioinformatics file I/O using Arrow and Polars
tools.detailed_description: A library that enables reading and working with bioinformatics file formats (FASTA, FASTQ, VCF, BAM, GFF) using Apache Arrow, Polars, and DuckDB for high-performance data analysis.

tools.name: OGU
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for organelle genomic data utilization
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox designed for processing and analyzing organelle genomic data, facilitating specific genomic workflows.
